string.text: Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
You must meet with one of the Sin group leaders. Go to him now.
Good luck.
Retrieve the Secrets of Lab X-16
You shall bring the secrets you can find inside Lab X-16 back to Stribog. The world must never find them.

As the true keepers of the Zone, we must act fast and keep its secrets hidden away from the eyes of this sinning world. One of the many secrets can be found inside the laboratory known as "X-16". Bring them to me, brother. We will keep them safe.
You have done well.
Escort the Believer
A man is seeking enlightenment. He wants to escape from his squad, kill the other members of the squad and escort him back to the Stribog. The man is carrying SVD rifle.

A man who believe in our cause have reached us out. He wish to be freed from this world, but he's still afraid on his own life. You must clear his way out of his squad. You will recognize him by the SVD he's carrying. I must let you know that he's still hesitating, expect him to shoot back while he's being under watch. Soon, he will be enlightened.
Your effort make us stronger. Well done!
Thank you, brother. I'm truly thankful... Lead the way, it is time to leave this old world behind.
We have arrived. I will go to meet my brothers. Farewell.
Avange the Sinners
You must find infidel who killed the Sin members, and avange them.
A handful of our brave fighters have been murdered in cold blood. We can't let the infidel escape. Avange our brothers.
You have all served our cause well.
Limansk Purge
Defeat the enemies inside the Limansk. Don't let one alive.
Time has come, brother. The monolith elders are seeking our help to purge Limansk and defeat the enemies lurking inside. Make us proud.
You are a fine warrior.
Relinquish Payment to Join Sin
You are to become a Sin member, you will have no more need for money. Give Stribog 1,000 RU to let you join the Sinners cause.
It's good you have come to your senses, my child. We will welcome you into the order of the Zone but you must first relinquish all of your worldly possessions in the form of 1,000 RU.
Well done. You shall bring light to this restless world from now on.
Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
My son, you serve the Sinners and Monolith well. Speak with one of the elders and ask what you may do to further help our great cause.
Good luck.
Retrieve the Secrets of Lab X-18
You shall bring the secrets you can find inside Lab X-18 back to Dazhbog. The world must never find them.

As the true keepers of the Zone, we must act fast and keep its secrets hidden away from the eyes of this sinning world. One of the many secrets can be found inside the laboratory known as "X-18". Bring them to me, brother. We will keep them safe.
Splendid work!
Hunt the Forest Beast
Dazhbog needs you to hunt down a beast that attacked his men inside the Red Forest.
This forest can be tough at times, even for our brothers. One of them has been attacked by a dangerous beast. Go out there and hunt it down.
Good job. The forest will be safer.
Slay the Enemy Informer
An infidel has been seen tracing the Sinners. Dazhbog tasked you to slay him.
One of the infidels has been seen tracing our brothers from distance. The coward ran back to his leaders. He must be slayed at any cost.
Great work. No one will dare approaching us again.
Find %s for Dazhbog
%s are required by Dazhbog to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I need you to do something for me. I need specific tools to tune our weapons.
Okay, I need a %s. Go, now.
You've done well.
Find %s for Dazhbog
%s are required by Dazhbog to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I need some more tools; better tools. Can you find what I ask, again?
I need a set of advanced tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Good. You've brought them to me.
Find %s for Dazhbog
%s are required by Dazhbog to install expert equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I need some more tools; better tools. Can you find what I ask, again?
I need a set of expert tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Good. You've brought them to me.
